Package dev.codescreen.BankLedgerAPI.service

Interface DatabaseInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseService
public interface DatabaseInterface

DBConnectionInterface

Declares all methods needed to perform the database interactions required for this API.

  • Method Details

    • open

      void open()

      open()

      Establishes connection to the external database.

    • close

      void close()

      close()

      Terminates connection to the external database.

    • createUserRecord

      String createUserRecord()

      createUserRecord()

      Creates and inserts new record for user if their userId isn't already in the database.

    • appendEventRecord

      Object appendEventRecord()

      appendEventRecord()

      Adds new event record to the Ledger collection for that user.

    • updateUserBalance

      Object updateUserBalance()

      updateUserBalance()

      Updates 'balance' value on a user's record. (This is separate from the user's Ledger, which cannot be updated after a record is added.)
